product_name: Merrell Mira Mix Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for travel, hiking and hanging out, the Merrell Mira Mix Shirt for women offers a comfortable fit and carefree polyester fabric. Front features a 5-button placket and self-fabric tie at the scoop neckline. Soft polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; back panel contains a touch of spandex for stretch. Raglan sleeves ensure comfort and easy motion. Closeout.
short_description: Great for travel, hiking and hanging out, the Merrell Mira Mix Shirt for women offers a comfortable fit and carefree polyester fabric.
